snippet: After 11 years in Los Angeles, the X Games will be staged in Austin, Tex., for the next four years beginning next May.
abstract: Austin, Tex, will host the X Games for four years, beginning in May 2014.
lead_paragraph: After 11 years in Los Angeles, the X Games will be staged in Austin, Tex., for the next four years beginning next May.

headline.main: X Games Will Be Held in Austin for Four Years
